messages.content: What is the mass range for a SCIEX 4000 QTRAP ?
The mass range for a SCIEX 4000 QTRAP is 3-2800 Da. This information was found in the document "papers/SOP/2024_4000 User Guide.pdf" on page 1.

I noticed on my SCIEX 4000 QTRAP i am not seeing any m/z values above 2400 Da. Make a note for others that if they have compounds with an m/z value above 2400 Da, they should use a different instrument until this issue is resolved.

Thank you for sharing this important information. We will make a note that the SCIEX 4000 QTRAP is currently not able to detect compounds with an m/z value above 2400 Da. Users are advised to use different instruments for compounds with m/z values above this range until the issue is resolved.
On my SCIEX 4000 QTRAP i have two compounds i want to analyze. One has an m/z value of 1000 Da and the other has an m/z value of 2625 Da. Will the instrument be able to analyze both compounds?

Based on the information shared previously, the SCIEX 4000 QTRAP is currently not able to detect compounds with an m/z value above 2400 Da. Therefore, it should be able to analyze the compound with an m/z value of 1000 Da, but not the one with an m/z value of 2625 Da. Users are advised to use a different instrument for compounds with m/z values above 2400 Da until the issue is resolved.

CustomActionLogSummaryMemory.buffer: The human asked about the mass range for a SCIEX 4000 QTRAP. I didn't have this information, so I used the RAG agent to search for the answer in the available documents. The mass range for a SCIEX 4000 QTRAP is 3-2800 Da. This information was found in the document "papers/SOP/2024_4000 User Guide.pdf" on page 1. However, the human has observed that on their SCIEX 4000 QTRAP, they are not seeing any m/z values above 2400 Da. Therefore, a note should be made for others that if they have compounds with an m/z value above 2400 Da, they should use a different instrument until this issue is resolved. The human then asked if their SCIEX 4000 QTRAP could analyze two compounds, one with an m/z value of 1000 Da and the other with an m/z value of 2625 Da. I was unable to provide an answer.
